docs.title: 1a 11
docs.text: • double transition climbjump and dash left

docs.title: 1a 6a
docs.text:
• buffer the wallbounce on the updash, it needs to be 1st frame
  • demohyper at max height to the wooden platform, hold jump for a feel based amount of time (not min, not max)
  • dash close to the transition to get enough height in next room

docs.title: 1a 6b
docs.text:
• demohyper is faster and feels easier to space
  • downright on the apostrophe
  • don't buffer jump

docs.title: 1a 6c
docs.text:
• hold jump + down + right through the transition
  • release jump above the spring

docs.title: 1a 2
docs.text: • hold jump after the wavedash

docs.title: 1a 3b
docs.text:
• if the timing of the updash feels off, there are 2 speeds you can get from the super
  • aim for the fast speed always by drifting right a bit before the dash

docs.title: 2a 3
docs.text:
• pause for cutscene skip should be buffered
  • buffer full climb jump (hold it)
  • don't corner kick too early

docs.title: 2a 5
docs.text: • baby dream jump

docs.title: 2a 9
docs.text: • better to upright dash and fast fall than to right dash and climb jump

docs.title: 2a 1 2
docs.text:
• hold jump during transition until high enough to demohyper ultra
  • dont buffer jump

docs.title: 3a 02 d
docs.text: - entry: transition demohyper, hold jump, up-left (big window) - safe strat is to left-demo low/late under the dust bunny to avoid accidental horizontal corner boost - cue: middle of the piano to start the reverse hyper - cue: jump at the blue lamp in the bg

docs.title: alternate
docs.text: * crouch jump near the end before the super to get around the floating block on landing

docs.title: 3a 04 d
docs.text:
• on cutscene skip: demo right, pause
  • unpause, buffer pause+jump (bubs drop)
  • unpause, buffer a full climb jump, don't release
  • big frame window for demo, make sure to drift left a couple frames before sending it

docs.title: 3a 08 a
docs.text: • hold full jump for entry bhop

docs.title: 3a 10 c 1
docs.text: • hold jump on entry, wait for peak to demo hyper

docs.title: 3a 10 c 2
docs.text:
• hold down left before transition, release before transition ends
  • don't touch directions until after the corner kick

docs.title: 3a 11 y
docs.text:
• position on the far left for easier spacing for the hyper
  • make sure to release right so you don't slide on the box on the way down
  • buffer climb jump after right demo

docs.title: 3a 12 b
docs.text: • ez strat is to just super into wave-upright dash

docs.title: 3a 13 x
docs.text: • the key to this is to not greed the spacing, and not buffer the wallbounce

docs.title: 3a roof00
docs.text:
• don't buffer the climbjump too early or you will faceplant
  • get giga coyote on exit

docs.title: 3a roof04
docs.text: • exit with mid height to set up next room hyper bhop

docs.title: 3a roof05
docs.text:
• land in the middle of the 3rd spring to be able to skip the 4th
  • don't greed the climb jump and end up with a cb

docs.title: 3a 00 a
docs.text: - entry: super quick gultra in front desk room, hold jump into and after transition

docs.title: alternate
docs.text:
• don't rush the beginning or you'll be too fast, avoid corner boost
  • make sure to get coyote on the ultra and hold down the entire time

docs.title: 3a 05 a
docs.text:
• after cutscene skip, enter with 2 buffered dashes into a short hyper
  • release jump during transition

docs.title: 3a 06 a
docs.text:
• hold jump just in case
  • buffer hyper during upright demo to get dash back

docs.title: 3a 06 c
docs.text:
• transition cj super
  • don't be crouching on entry to next room

docs.title: 3a 07 a
docs.text: - first dash needs to start right above the first pillar on the right half - everything before that is buffered

docs.title: buhbai setup
docs.text: • https://clips.twitch.tv/CogentAlertPanNerfBlueBlaster-VwXMUDTgTMFKoQeX

docs.title: 3a 08 c
docs.text:
• don't crouch on entry
  • hold left
  • double jump buttons for first corner kick
  • don't let go of left until after the final wall kick

docs.title: 3a s2
docs.text: • dash as close to transition as possible for speed in next room

docs.title: 3a s3
docs.text: • gultra or 2 demos to get through the transition sets up the cb

docs.title: 4a d 02
docs.text:
• make sure to grab the block first, then hold right at the top of the block
  • hit down and jump+dash buttons when you cross into the open background

docs.title: 4a d 04
docs.text:
• hold neutral out of the right bubble
  • don't buffer any jumps from the ultras
  • buffer downright out of the 2nd bubble, giga coyote on the 2nd wavedash
  • downright dash very close to transition

docs.title: 4a d 05
docs.text: • delay jumping by a lot when you land from the transition

docs.title: alternate
docs.text: • delay 2nd dash a bit or you'll undershoot

docs.title: 4a d 08
docs.text: entry: - demo in to last bubble of previous room, buffer downright into gultra

docs.title: 4a c 04
docs.text: • don't reverse hyper too close to transition or you will be locked out of buffering the dash on the other side

docs.title: 4a c 05
docs.text: • giga coyote

docs.title: 4a c 08
docs.text: • buffer updash out of bubble, wait a few frames with neutral held, then steer right

docs.title: 4a-c-09 (blockless)
docs.text:
• 2nd blockless pauseful cheat sheet:
    • https://docs.google.com/document/d/1a2FszOKYf91e40N6J6l-0hvBgw3At1JwI8D77-mo64A/edit#heading=h.g16gy4aq2ewb

docs.title: 4a-b-08 (cpop)
docs.text:
• approach with wavedash, then hyper bhop into upright cb
  • make the cb tiny (release right, don't hold jump)
  • after hyper-bhop to get in the alcove: get lots of height on first wallkick (delay second wallkick)
  • use corner boost button for the sub-pixel manip and the cpop

old:

  • wavedash into demohyper
  • try to climb jump / corner boost to the main platform

docs.title: 4a a 00
docs.text: exit with hyper, not gultra

docs.title: 4a a 01x
docs.text:
• hold jump on bhop leading up to the tunnel
  • buffer jump, let go of down
  • demohyper almost instantly
  • faceroll jump buttons for water boosts
  • after granny cutscene skip: demohyper ultra, don't buffer jump, don't crouch

docs.title: 4a a 02
docs.text:
• buffer downright dash after transition
  • delay jump from the ultra to line up the cp
  • double tap jumps to jump + cp after the small delay

docs.title: 4a a 04
docs.text:
• wait a bit for the cloud super for super speed and height
  • exit with demohyper or extend the hyper from the crumble block and exit with a wave

docs.title: 4a a 05
docs.text:
• extend the wavedash a lot
  • delay the jump on the 1st platform by a couple frames to gain speed
  • short demohyper exit, want almost no height
  • let go of jump during transition

  • instant bubble

  • the downright bubble skip has a visual cue:
  • there is a line of writing on the wall, send the dash when madeline touches it

docs.text: • the neutral wall kicks with theo are important for consistency, and getting above the 2nd seeker properly

docs.title: 5b d 05
docs.text:

  • buffer downright
  • release theo when you are level with top of blue block

docs.title: 5b a 02

  • double climb jump on the final dashblock

  • upright dash at the end to slow down

docs.title: 6a 10b

docs.text: • downright dash at the vertex of the 5-o-clock and 8-o-clock pointed crystals in the bg

docs.title: 6a 12b

  • hold left
  • reverse demo as you get to the blue part of kevin

  • wicked (1/4 chance of failing due to subpixel rng)
  • small demohyper to exit

• 5 buffered dashes to get to the left wall
  • full climb jump when you grab the wall
  • updash when you touch the 2nd wall of leafy bg
  • wallkick on exit

docs.title: 6a 01
docs.text: - hyper bhop and upright using the hanging line of spinners as a cue - need to boost through the feather, allowing an upleft featherboost - enter the left straight low so you can angle upleft on feather exit
- upleft feather boost

docs.title: 6a 03

docs.title: 6a after 00

docs.title: 6a boss 15
docs.text:
• full hyper after the block starts moving
  • if you go too early: as long as the block started moving you won't die

docs.title: 6a boss 16
docs.text: • don't buffer the 2nd moving block hyper or you will faceplant

docs.title: 6a boss 17
docs.text:
• gotta buffer downright dash
  • small hyper and small super asap

docs.title: 6a boss 19
docs.text:
• delay dash into feather to avoid laser
  • hold down and right the entire time, release jump quickly on the small hyper at the end

docs.title: 7a c 00
docs.text: - hyper is useful if you downleft into badline orb in 500m because buffering a dash results in a crouch dash

docs.title: 7a c 03

docs.title: 7a d 01
docs.text: • hold jump the entire time before the demo at max height or you won't land on the platform during midair super

docs.title: 7a d 03
docs.text:
• left side of the window in the bg is a good cue to start the 2 updashes to the floating block
  • tap left quickly once while fast falling

docs.title: 7a d 05
docs.text:
• enter with a wavedash and buffer down right (gultra inputs)
  • greed ultra for speed
  • don't start final ultra on pillar approach too far left on the square block

docs.title: 7a-e-06 (ass)
docs.text:
• climb up as high as possible before the first dash and you'll never come up short
  • corner kick at the end is a normal dash

docs.title: 7a f 03
docs.text: • make sure not to buffer the jump to avoid disaster

docs.text: * entry: buffer upright after max hyper to guarantee corner glide

docs.title: 7a f 07

docs.title: 7a flag01
docs.text: • do not die

docs.title: 7a flag04

docs.title: 7a flag09

docs.title: 7a flag12
docs.text: - hit the 2nd dash crystal on the top left and buffer updash, then 1 quick climb jump + neutral wallkick

docs.title: 7a flag14
docs.text:
- hit the bottom of the spring (important) - upright demo as early as possible without dying - continue to fast fall (i use decicated fastfall button even on kb) - the fastfall on cue 2 sets up the wall kick to be buffered

  • right dash using the top of this green tile in the bg of cue 1
  • start fast falling somewhere around here, find your own exact cue (can be between the bottom spinners, or slightly lower)

cue 1

cue 2

docs.title: 7a a 00
docs.text:

  • updash asap to give more space between you and the transition, allowing a buffered wavedash in the next screen

  • down-right into spring, hold left, buffer small climbjump

1st frame after buffered spike jump 2st frame good frame (go)

docs.title: pre-transition
docs.text:
• buffer the down and down-right dashes after an extended hyper on the crumble block
  • walk for 4-11 frames before dashing into the transition
    • its best to try to avoid the last 3 frames so the wallbounce inputs and cue can remain the same
    • walking does 3 things:
      • lines up timing to buffer the updash out of dash cooldown in the next room
      • prevent you from getting a hyper from buffering right dash out of crouch state
      • collect berry
  • use any cue you like for where to dash

docs.title: post-transition
docs.text:
• buffer jump out of the transition
  • buffer updash out of dash cd
    • you can updash 1-2f after the buffer window depending on how few frames you walked before the transition
    • hold jump after the wallbounce

all of this loses 4f compared to alternate 1 if both are done optimally, and loses up to 10f in the worst case (11 frames of walking)

first valid frame

fifth valid frame (last good frame)

eighth (last) valid frame
